subject: Repair Help
description_text:
Hi,

I purchased the Pro Plus pedals about a half a year ago on Amazon, while it
was working great, unfortunately, either my cat or something happened that
broke the connector of the brake pedal. So I was wondering what type of
plug it was and also what kind of tool I need so I can repair it myself.
Thank you so much for your help.

Best,
Vu Truong

conversations.body_text: Hi Vu Truong,    It uses a 4P4C connector. If you have access to a local computer repair shop, you can follow the same wiring order as the brake pedal and simply re-crimp a new 4P4C connector to resolve the issue.
